title.narrative: Support to SDUB for 1st phase Maraza 2022

description.narrative: One of the main elements of the Beira masterplan 2035 is the development of a new urban area: the Maraza Residential Zone. The general concept of the Project is to base the layout and design of the area such that it follows natural elements, such as local geomorphology, topography, natural water drainage and soil conditions. The SDUB is the owner of the land titles (DUAT) of the Maraza area and has the task to attract potential investors and developers for Maraza for the construction and selling of houses of which at least 30% is an ‘affordable’ house. A pilot area of 3,5 hectares has been completed in March 2022. The contractor will support the SDUB in realizing the first residential buildings in the mini-pilot area of Maraza in the coming 9 months. At the end of the assignment the SDUB is expected to have closed a deal with interested investors and developers for 10 to 16 houses/apartments with a solid business case, clear governance structure, financial plan and risk agreements. Secondly an advice on a supervision strategy of the guarantee fund, that is to be managed by SDUB, is to be delivered. If the deal for the first residential buildings is delivered and the contract allows more support then support for the strategy plan for the mini pilot area and the lager 50 Ha pilot area is required.
